description:
A new update regarding Netflix has subscribers quite upset. In fact, many subscribers have threatened to cancel their subscriptions if they haven’t done so already. These sentiments can be shared in some of the tweets below, taken from X, which were written in response to news regarding one of the streaming platform’s biggest shows. The [...]

The post Netflix Viewers Cancel Subscriptions After Disappointing Update appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Netflix Viewers Cancel Subscriptions After Disappointing Update

description:
Ana de Armas and Sydney Sweeney are two of Hollywood’s biggest stars at the moment. As such, it may intrigue moviegoers to know that the two are working on a new project together. In fact, Ana de Armas has teased a “crazy threesome” in this new movie alongside Sydney Sweeney. The new film, titled Eden, [...]

The post Ana De Armas Teases “Crazy Threesome” In New Movie With Sydney Sweeney appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Ana De Armas Teases “Crazy Threesome” In New Movie With Sydney Sweeney
